mapper.select: select board.board_no as boardNo,member.nickname as "memberVO.nickName", to_char(board.time_posted,'yyyy.mm.dd') as timePosted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id

select board.board_no as boardNo,member.nickname as "memberVO.nickName", to_char(board.time_posted,'yyyy.mm.dd') as timePosted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id and review.title=#{value}

select board.board_no as boardNo,member.nickname as "memberVO.nickName", to_char(board.time_posted,'yyyy.mm.dd') as timePosted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id and member.nickname=#{value}
